  • Juan J. Ramirez

    Product Design Lead @Netflix | Prev. @Meta, @GitLab, @Amazon

    6d Edited
    • Report this post

    I launched Brainglue without an onboarding flow for two reasons: 1) I was too impatient and wanted to get it out so I could start getting a signal. I was done writing code without seeing some sentiment about the idea. 2) My arrogant designer ego had this thought: "Brainglue is insanely easy. People will definitely get it, and they will love it". I'm glad I launched because of number 1, but obviously, I was wrong about number 2. So, I hustled this weekend and wrote a proper onboarding flow/tutorial for Brainglue that hopefully explains the benefits of prompt chains a little bit better. If you want to give it a try, check it at https://lnkd.in/dhdrN82y. It doesn't require you to be logged in and takes 3 minutes. (Desktop recommended, but it will work on mobile).

    Brainglue | AI Playground and AI Workflow API

    brainglue.ai

  • Alexander Ratner

    Co-founder and CEO at Snorkel AI

    6d
    • Report this post

    Thanks Aaron Holmes The Information for the quote & great article on a key AI strategy: *Model distillation* https://lnkd.in/g75ETrev The future of enterprise AI is many smaller *specialist* models, fine-tuned to be cheaper, faster, & more accurate on specific tasks. First, basic intuition: You don't need a massive *generalist* AI model that can recite Roman poetry to solve a specific enterprise task... Instead, you start w/ the generalist model and fine-tune + distill to a *specialist* model that is cheaper, faster, & more accurate. This technique of *distillation* is an old one- but there are many exciting new approaches in the LLM era! Check out our work led by Cheng-Yu Hsieh University of Washington + Google on a new model distillation technique, recently highlighted on the Google blog: https://lnkd.in/g6D_FMGt Most distillation approaches are a form of *fine-tuning*, and the key to successful fine tuning is the data labeling & curation. Check out our support for fine-tuning + distillation workflows Snorkel AI; see case studies: - https://lnkd.in/g3xmRjps - https://lnkd.in/gazbRjrZ

    How Microsoft is Trying to Lessen Its Addiction to OpenAI as AI Costs Soar

    theinformation.com
